name: FileUpload
description: FileUpload is an advanced uploader with dragdrop support, multi file uploads, auto uploading, progress tracking and validations.

name.label: name
name.title: Name of the request parameter to identify the files at backend.

url.label: url
url.title: Remote url to upload the files.

mode.label: mode
mode.title: Defines the UI of the component, possible values are "advanced" and "basic".

multiple.label: multiple
multiple.title: Used to select multiple files at once from file dialog.

accept.label: accept
accept.title: Pattern to restrict the allowed file types such as "image/*".

auto.label: auto
auto.title: When enabled, upload begins automatically after selection is completed.

max-file-size.label: maxFileSize
max-file-size.title: Maximum file size allowed in bytes.

invalid-file-size-message.label: invalidFileSizeMessage
invalid-file-size-message.title: Message of the invalid fize size.
invalid-file-size-message.default: {0}: Invalid file size, file size should be smaller than {1}.

invalid-file-limit-message.label: invalidFileLimitMessage
invalid-file-limit-message.title: Message to display when number of files to be uploaded exceeeds the limit.
invalid-file-limit-message.default: Maximum number of files exceeded, limit is {0} at most.

file-limit.label: fileLimit
file-limit.title: Maximum number of files that can be uploaded.

with-credentials.label: withCredentials
with-credentials.title: Cross-site Access-Control requests should be made using credentials such as cookies, authorization headers or TLS client certificates.

preview-width.label: previewWidth
preview-width.title: Width of the image thumbnail in pixels.

choose-label.label: chooseLabel
choose-label.title: Label of the choose button. Defaults to PrimeVue Locale configuration.

upload-label.label: uploadLabel
upload-label.title: Label of the upload button. Defaults to PrimeVue Locale configuration.

cancel-label.label: cancelLabel
cancel-label.title: Label of the cancel button. Defaults to PrimeVue Locale configuration.

custom-upload.label: customUpload
custom-upload.title: Whether to use the default upload or a manual implementation defined in uploadHandler callback. Defaults to PrimeVue Locale configuration.

show-upload-button.label: showUploadButton
show-upload-button.title: Whether to show the upload button.

show-cancel-button.label: showCancelButton
show-cancel-button.title: Whether to cancel the upload button.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

slots.name: empty
slots.title: Custom content when there is no selected file

slots.name: fileremoveicon
slots.title: Custom remove icon template for each file.

events.name: before-upload
events.title: Callback to invoke before file upload begins to customize the request such as post parameters before the files.

events.name: before-send
events.title: Callback to invoke before file send begins to customize the request such as adding headers.

events.name: upload
events.title: Callback to invoke when file upload is complete.

events.name: error
events.title: Callback to invoke if file upload fails.

events.name: clear
events.title: Callback to invoke when files in queue are removed without uploading.

events.name: select
events.title: Callback to invoke when file upload is complete.

events.name: progress
events.title: Callback to invoke when files are selected.

events.name: uploader
events.title: Callback to invoke to implement a custom upload.

events.name: remove
events.title: Callback to invoke when a singe file is removed from the list.
